Texts.Chs: 我杀光了所有胆敢挑战我的人！今天，我也将会是胜出者！而我的事迹将会随着时间的流逝广为人知！
Texts.Eng: A protector to slaughter, just for me! This will be a crowning achievement; today my legend grows ever larger!

Texts.Chs: 所以说，你打算逞英雄？勇敢而愚蠢，我最喜欢你这类的人。来让我好好的和你亲热亲热！
Texts.Eng: And so the hero arrives! Brave and foolish, my favourite type. I will break you and relish every moment of it.

Texts.Chs: 我会杀了你，然后把你挂在墙上欣赏！
Texts.Eng: I'll slaughter you and use your loot to replace the guards you killed!

Texts.Chs: 哈，你要挑战我？拿起你的武器，来吧！
Texts.Eng: My, my! If a protector feels the need to challenge me, I must be doing something right. Step up and lend your head to one of my many pikes.
